translations: n．三人执政团：由三个人组成的执政集团或领导团队。
· The triumvirates ruled the country together.
三人执政团共同统治这个国家。

sentences.sentence: "Pitt was one of the triumvirates of men - the other 2 were Johnny Depp and Willem Dafoe - whom Angie had watched and wondered about from afar, " Morton writes.
sentences.translation: 书中写道：“皮特只是开始。朱莉的另外两个目标是约翰尼·德普和威廉·达福，朱莉已经关注他们两个很久了。”
